description: Run a flash effect by changing to a color and back.

entity_id.description: Name(s) of entities to run the effect on.

mode.description: Decides how colors are changed. Possible values: blink, breathe, ping, strobe, solid.

brightness.description: Number between 0..255 indicating brightness of the temporary color.

period.description: Duration of the effect in seconds (default 1.0).

cycles.description: Number of times the effect should run (default 1.0).

power_on.description: Powered off lights are temporarily turned on during the effect (default True).
